languages.text: "Э-э-э, нет. Хватит. Достаточно. Краник уже пора перекрыть". {n}Идира с нарочитой деловитостью размазывает накатившие на глаза слезы.{/n}
"Uh, yeah, no. Enough's enough. I've had my fill of waterworks, thank you." {n}Idira brusquely wipes away her tears with pointed determination.{/n}

languages.text: "Äh, ja, nein. Genug ist genug. Ich habe schon genug geweint, danke." {n}Idira wischt sich mit demonstrativer Entschlossenheit trotzig die Tränen weg.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uh, yeah, no. Enough's enough. I've had my fill of waterworks, thank you." {n}Idira brusquely wipes away her tears with pointed determination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Äh, ja, nein. Genug ist genug. Ich habe schon genug geweint, danke." {n}Idira wischt sich entschlossen die aufsteigenden Tränen ab.{/n}

languages.text: « Ah, non, ça suffit comme ça. Pour les pleurs, j'ai déjà donné, merci bien. » {n}Idira essuie brusquement ses larmes avec détermination.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uh, yeah, no. Enough's enough. I've had my fill of waterworks, thank you." {n}Idira brusquely wipes away her tears with pointed determination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Euhhh, non, ça suffit comme ça. Pour les pleurs, j'ai déjà donné, merci bien. » {n}Idira essuie les quelques larmes qui pointent avec détermination.{/n}

languages.text: “呃，是啊。不，到此为止。我可不想继续哭哭啼啼了，就这样吧。”{n}伊迪拉下定了决心，猛地擦干了眼泪。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uh, yeah, no. Enough's enough. I've had my fill of waterworks, thank you." {n}Idira brusquely wipes away her tears with pointed determination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “呃，是啊。不，到此为止。我可不想继续哭哭啼啼了，就这样吧。”{n}伊迪拉下定了决心，擦干了眼泪。{/n}

languages.text: 「ああ、いえ、いいの。もうたくさん。いっぱい泣いたから、大丈夫」{n}イディラはあふれ出る涙をきっぱりと拭い去った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uh, yeah, no. Enough's enough. I've had my fill of waterworks, thank you." {n}Idira brusquely wipes away her tears with pointed determination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、いえ、いいの。もうたくさん。もう目いっぱい泣いたから、大丈夫」{n}イディラはあふれ出る涙を鋭い決意で拭い去った。{/n}
「ああ、いえ、いいの。もうたくさん。いっぱい泣いたから、大丈夫」{n}イディラはあふれ出る涙をきっぱりと拭い去った。{/n}

languages.text: «Ay, no, ya basta. Ya he llorado más que suficiente, gracias». {n}Idira, decidida, se seca bruscamente las lágrimas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uh, yeah, no. Enough's enough. I've had my fill of waterworks, thank you." {n}Idira brusquely wipes away her tears with pointed determination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ay, no, ya basta. He tenido suficiente drama, gracias». {n}Idira se enjuaga las lágrimas que comienzan a brotar con determinación.{/n}

languages.original_text: "Uhh, yeah, no. Enough's enough. I've had my fill of waterworks, thank you." {n}Idira wipes the emerging tears with pointed determination.{/n}

languages.text: "Of, yeter ya. Benden paydos. Benim musluk bugün yeterince çalıştı." {n}İdira, gözlerindeki yaşları kabaca ve kararlılıkla siliyor.{/n}
